metadata.Title: CVE-2022-27223 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low
metadata.Description: In drivers/usb/gadget/udc/udc-xilinx.c in the Linux kernel before 5.16.12,the endpoint index is not validated and might be manipulated by the hostfor out-of-array access.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
